Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: WCI Co-pilot Dashboard v2.0

Features:
- Dashboard with KPIs, agent activity, and price change requests table
- Decisions & Actions tab with activity log and filter tabs
- Human-in-the-Loop \(HITL\) tab with reason-based filtering
- HITL reasons: Unknown Sender, Margin Breach, Missing Info
- Dark/Light mode support
- React Router for URL-based navigation
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Vercel deployment configuration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
